actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide that determinations relating to annuity benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System or the Federal Employee's Retirement System for survivors of individuals separating before October 1, 1993, shall be made in accordance with applicable provisions of law, as in effect on March 31, 1993.

summary.text: Provides that any determination relating to annuity benefits under the Civil Service or Federal Employees Retirement Systems for survivors of Federal employees or Members of Congress separating before October 1, 1993, shall be made in accordance with applicable law in effect on March 31, 1993.

titles.title: To provide that determinations relating to annuity benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System or the Federal Employee's Retirement System for survivors of individuals separating before October 1, 1993, shall be made in accordance with applicable provisions of law, as in effect on March 31, 1993.
